Management Science Final Project, 2016

Decision Support Tool

Facilitated the beginning process of complicated group dynamics by collaborating with a group of 5 students to design and program an excel tool, using Visual Basics for Application programming language. The tool asks for information and generates displays to guide group project members towards proactive decisions.

Date

December, 2016

Location

Waterloo, Ontario
